unnormalised: Arrey yaar, statistics mhaka khup dokedukhi dita! Mhunnllear, Bayes' theorem mhaka khorench kollpachi probability kitle ashtele? Zaite zale tor 0.0001%! Ani standard deviation-acher mhaka start korunk dho naka… mhoje marks mean-antlean khup deviete zatat, tem praktikalek national disaster zalla bhaxen. Mhaka nischit asaa lottery jinkpachi mhoji chance (1 in 292.2 million) hi exam pass zavnpakitleank bhartik vhodd asa. Seriously, hanv ani ek normal distribution curve pollele tor, hanv faint zatolim, boss!
normalised: Aye yaar, statistics mhaka kitlem dokem dukhaita! Mhaka Bayes' theorem khorench kollun gheunchi probability kitei asteli? Ziro point ziro ziro ziro ek percent asteli! Ani standard deviation vixim mhaka sanguchinaka… mhoje marks mean-an thaun kitlench door geleat, tem practically ek national disaster zala. Mhaka khobor asa lottery jitun gheunchi chances (don’nui shainyuy ani bavann point don million-ant ek) he exam pass zaunche thaun unch asat. Seriously, zaddi normal distribution curve polleli zalear, hanv behoosh zatam, boss!
text: Arrey yaar, statistics mhaka khup dokedukhi dita! Mhunnllear, Bayes' theorem mhaka khorench kollpachi probability kitle ashtele? Zaite zale tor 0.0001%! Ani standard deviation-acher mhaka start korunk dho naka… mhoje marks mean-antlean khup deviete zatat, tem praktikalek national disaster zalla bhaxen. Mhaka nischit asaa lottery jinkpachi mhoji chance (1 in 292.2 million) hi exam pass zavnpakitleank bhartik vhodd asa. Seriously, hanv ani ek normal distribution curve pollele tor, hanv faint zatolim, boss!
